title: 2022 Virginia Highway Safety Summit
text_content:
The Virginia Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV) hosted its annual Highway Safety Summit in person at the Hilton Alexandria Mark Center in Alexandria, VA May 3-5, 2022. Tuesday, May 3 served as a pre-summit training day for our highway safety partners.
The summit featured sessions on current highway safety issues to continue our efforts to decrease the number of crashes, injuries and fatalities on our roadways. Speakers from the national, state and local level will discuss a variety of topics from our highway safety focus areas.
Stakeholders from law enforcement, state agencies, non-profits and higher education, as well as other highway safety advocates were invited to attend.
